name: Please Take Me with You!! I Can Be of Great Help to You!!
type: Fish-Man/The Seven Warlords of the Sea/The Sun Pirates
effect: [Main] If your Leader is [Jinbe] and you have 2 or less cards in your hand, draw 2 cards.
trigger: [Trigger] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand.
